name: PUGS IN SPACE
description:
Pugs are incredible cosmonauts- the only downside is they get bored really quickly. Keep up their pulse by maintaining high speeds and narrowly dodging obstacles! Remember to try and collect as many packages as possible!


XBOX CONTROLLER REQUIRED!!

Left Stick: Thruster, Roll

Right Stick: Yaw, Pitch

Right Trigger: Thrust

X: Restart

This game was developed for the indiegalactic 2017 game jam. Everything was created by me, except the skybox which was created by Heather Miller!
